select
p.id, p.tipo_id, p.nombre, p.fechanacimiento,
e.id as eps_id, e.nombre as eps_nombre, e.nit as eps_nit,
c.id as consulta_id, c.fechayhora as consulta_fechayhora, c.resumen as consulta_resumen, c.costo as consulta_costo
FROM "public"."paciente" as p left join "public"."consulta" as c on p.id=c.paciente_id left join "public"."eps" as e on p.eps_id=e.id
WHERE c.id=#{id}

select
p.id, p.tipo_id, p.nombre, p.fechanacimiento,
e.id as eps_id, e.nombre as eps_nombre, e.nit as eps_nit,
c.id as consulta_id, c.fechayhora as consulta_fechayhora, c.resumen as consulta_resumen, c.costo as consulta_costo
FROM "public"."paciente" as p left join "public"."consulta" as c on p.id=c.paciente_id left join "public"."eps" as e on p.eps_id=e.id WHERE p.id=#{id}

select
p.id, p.tipo_id, p.nombre, p.fechanacimiento,
e.id as eps_id, e.nombre as eps_nombre, e.nit as eps_nit,
c.id as consulta_id, c.fechayhora as consulta_fechayhora, c.resumen as consulta_resumen, c.costo as consulta_costo
FROM "public"."paciente" as p left join "public"."consulta" as c on p.id=c.paciente_id left join "public"."eps" as e on p.eps_id=e.id

select sum(c.costo), p.id, p.tipo_id, p.nombre, p.fechanacimiento,
e.id as eps_id, e.nombre as eps_nombre, e.nit as eps_nit,
c.id as consulta_id, c.fechayhora as consulta_fechayhora, c.resumen as consulta_resumen, c.costo as consulta_costo
FROM "public"."paciente" as p left join "public"."consulta" as c on p.id=c.paciente_id left join "public"."eps" as e on p.eps_id=e.id WHERE e.nombre=#{nameEps} GROUP BY p.id,e.id,c.id HAVING sum(c.costo)>=#{deuda}
